name: Vivillon
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: Vivillon with many different patterns are found all over the world. These patterns are affected by the climate of their habitat.

attacks.name: Conversion Powder
attacks.effect: Choose either Asleep or Poisoned. Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.

attacks.name: Colorful Wind
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each different type of basic Energy attached to this Pokémon.
